issue.title: Metadata's boundary
issue.body:
**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

In the actual version (4.2.0-rc1), I must be careful not to give the same name to two boundaries.
In other words, if I have two boundaries with the same name (in the same boudary's category or not), I can't retrieve from the metadata which of them I selected.

I suggest to add a sdi markup under gmd:EX_EXTENT to save the guid of that boundary ; this guid must be used in the metadata edit form as value to retrieve data to draw the map.
